title: Bookmarks containing subdomains are reset, when the corresponding second level domain bookmark ist added.
label: [Label(name="bug")]
body:
Android 6.0.1, Bookmarks 1.2, Nextcloud Server 12.0.4

Steps to recreate:
1. Create bookmark - https://drive.google.com
2. Create bookmark - https://groups.google.com
3. Create bookmark - https://google.com

Expected behaviour:
Bookmarks are created independently and are not touched when the "pure" SLD bookmark is added in step 3.

Actual behaviour:
After step 3 the bookmarks of step 1 & 2 are changed to https://google.com

I could not recreate this in the web app. It only happens if you use the android app.

title: Cannot Connect to a Self-Signed Server
body:
What was done:
Connection attempt to URL https://127.0.0.1/nextcloud with correct username and password.
The server uses a self-signed certificate.

What was Expected:
Prompt that the server uses a self-signed/untrusted certificate, asking user whether trust it or not.

What Actually Happened:
Error messages without information about SSL or certificate.
Connection Failed. Check if
・You have internet access
・the URL is correct

What Worked:
Connecting to the server without SSL, which is much dangerous.
